Entries.winter_26_1: One time, Raz gave me an 800 page book of spells for my birthday. Then she gave me two weeks to memorise them and went off to see some woman while I stayed at home studying.$5
Entries.winter_26_2: One time, Raz gave me an 800 page book of spells for my birthday. Then she gave me two weeks to memorise them and went off to see some woman while I stayed at home studying.$5
Entries.winter_27_1: One time, Raz gave me a book of poems for my birthday. Poems written by his ex-wife. Poems written by his ex-wife that were dedicted to her.$5
Entries.winter_27_2: One time, Raz gave me a book of poems for my birthday. Poems written by his ex-wife. Poems written by his ex-wife that were dedicted to her.$5
Entries.spring_Sun: If you ever want to piss off Raz - and who doesn't? - just recite "Double, double toil and trouble; fire burn and cauldron bubble" whenever you have to stir something around her. She'll go from zero to sixty in no time at all, I promise.$3
Entries.spring_Sun8: Sunday used to be the day Raz would visit with the other magic people. She brought me with her only once, and regretted it within the hour.$3
Entries.summer_Sat8: The old forest is generally closed to humans, so I only ever saw Raz when she came to check up on me.#$e#It's fine. It's not like I wanted to see my parents again or anything like that.$12
Entries.summer_Sun: Has Raz mentioned anything about needing an apprentice?#$b#Well, if she does, let me know straight away. Then run far, far away!
Entries.fall_Mon: Ah, today is such a great day! Why? Because yesterday I managed to capture - on film! - Raz accidentally swallowing a spider after I'd pushed her into a pile of leaves!$1
Entries.winter_Sun: One day, @, I shall prove to the world that Raz' potions don't actually need to be disgusting. She simply has no taste.$3
Entries.winter_Sat10: Have you figured out your New Year's resolutions yet, @?#$b#Personally, I'm going to continue to do my very best to be the greatest friend in the world to Robin, the most awesome sibling ever to Olive and the biggest challenge since her ex-wife to Raz' peace of mind.$4#$b#Hm, I guess you're right - you and your unending loyalty do deserve some type of reward. How about I make you my honorary partner in crime?$3
Entries.fall_Sun10: Raz thinks she's being subtle, but one can only trip over college applications so many times before one starts to suspect there's an ulterior motive involved.$11#$e#When I said I wanted her to be more present, I didn't mean for her to take after that nag Pierre.$5
